description: Executes an Analytics query for data. [Here](https://dev.loganalytics.io/documentation/Using-the-API) is an example for using POST with an Analytics query.

workspace_id.description: ID of the workspace. This is Workspace ID from the Properties blade in the Azure portal.

body.description: The Analytics query. Learn more about the [Analytics query syntax](https://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/articles/app-insights-analytics-reference/)
